item.title: 比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）因阿尔凯戈斯公司倒闭案受审的陪审员即将选出
item.description: 黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）因其价值 360 亿美元的基金 Archegos Capital Management 于 2021 年倒闭而受到敲诈勒索罪的刑事审判，预计将于周四结束陪审团的挑选工作，为下周的开庭陈述和证人证词做好准备。【原文：Jury selection is expected to wrap up Thursday in the criminal racketeering trial of Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang over the 2021 collapse of his $36 billion fund Archegos Capital Management, setting the stage for opening statements and witness testimony next week.】

item.title: 独家报道必和必拓与英美资源集团的交易引发日本钢铁业警觉
item.description: 日本钢铁制造商向澳大利亚当局表示担心，如果必和必拓集团继续收购英美资源集团（Anglo American），可能会在全球炼焦煤供应中占据过大的主导地位。【原文：Japanese steelmakers have raised concerns with Australian authorities that BHP Group could become too dominant in the global supply of coking coal if it goes ahead with a takeover of Anglo American .】

item.title: 数据显示，对联邦存款保险公司领导层的不信任促使更多员工考虑离职
item.description: 路透社获得的最新联邦存款保险公司员工调查数据显示，员工对联邦存款保险公司领导层的信任度急剧下降，远低于政府平均水平，越来越多的员工考虑离开该机构。【原文：Staff trust in the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation's leadership has fallen sharply to well below government averages, with a growing number of workers considering leaving the agency, the latest FDIC staff survey data obtained by Reuters shows.】

item.title: 聚焦：拖拉机太多随着经济繁荣时期的消逝，农用设备堆积如山
item.description: 农作物价格下降使农业设备销售商面临拖拉机和联合收割机滞销的问题。为了解决过剩问题，经销商正在对机器打折、暂停新订单，甚至降价拍卖设备。【原文：Falling crop prices are leaving agriculture equipment sellers with an excess of unsold tractors and combines. To cope with the surplus, dealers are discounting machines, suspending new orders, and even auctioning off equipment at reduced prices.】

item.title: 国债收益率上升，等待失业救济数据，期指下跌
item.description: 美国股指期货周四下滑，原因是国债收益率在申请失业救济人数数据公布前进一步上升，该数据可能会更清楚地显示美联储今年的利率议程。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Thursday as Treasury yields rose further ahead of jobless claims data that could provide a clearer picture of the Federal Reserve's interest rate agenda for the year.】

item.title: 独家报道：企业气候监督文件认为碳抵消基本无效
item.description: 路透社审阅的一份机密初稿显示，一个有影响力的企业气候行动组织的工作人员现在发现，这种抵消在很大程度上是无效的，该组织的董事会宣布了一项计划，允许企业用碳信用额抵消其供应链中的温室气体排放。【原文：Staff at an influential corporate climate action group whose board announced a plan to allow companies to offset greenhouse gas emissions from their supply chain with carbon credits has now found such offsets are largely ineffective, a confidential preliminary draft reviewed by Reuters shows.】

item.title: 美联储的沟通风格在分析师中得分很高，但在公众中得分不高
item.description: 据周四公布的一项针对学术界和私营部门分析师的调查显示，在经历了高通胀、激进加息和全球不稳定的动荡时期后，美国联邦储备委员会（美联储）在其货币政策沟通方面获得了相对较高的评价，尽管它一直在不确定性的重重困难中徘徊。【原文：Through a tumultuous period of high inflation, aggressive interest rate hikes, and global instability, the U.S. Federal Reserve received relatively high marks for its monetary policy communications despite the thicket of uncertainty it has been navigating, according to a survey of academic and private-sector analysts released on Thursday.】

item.title: 日产汽车第四季度营业利润增长 3
item.description: 日本日产汽车公司周四公布第四季度营业利润增长 3%，同时警告称，预计本财年将继续面临激烈的竞争和通胀压力。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor posted a 3% rise in fourth-quarter operating profit on Thursday while warning that it expects to keep facing intense competition and inflationary pressure this financial year.】

item.title: 拉扎德聘请资深医疗保健交易员科洛奇担任副董事长
item.description: 投资银行拉扎德有限公司（Lazard Ltd）发布公告称，已任命资深医疗保健交易员米歇尔-科洛奇（Michele Colocci）担任副董事长兼董事总经理，旨在促进其医疗保健咨询业务的增长。【原文：Investment bank Lazard Ltd has appointed veteran healthcare dealmaker Michele Colocci as vice chairman and managing director, aiming to boost the growth of its healthcare advisory, according to a company announcement.】

item.title: 美国超越中国成为德国第一大贸易伙伴
item.description: 路透社根据德国统计局的官方数据计算得出，今年第一季度美国超过中国成为德国最重要的贸易伙伴。【原文：The United States overtook China as Germany's most important trading partner in the first quarter of this year, according to Reuters' calculations based on official data from the German statistics office.】

item.title: Blackstone 可能成为 Hipgnosis Songs 的赢家，Concord 维持较低出价
item.description: 由 Apollo 支持的 Concord 周四表示，将坚持以每股 1.25 美元的价格收购 Hipgnosis Songs Fund，几天前 Blackstone 曾出价超过该公司收购夏奇拉（Shakira）和红辣椒（Red Hot Chili Peppers）等艺人的音乐版权所有者。【原文：Apollo-backed Concord said on Thursday it will stick with its offer of $1.25 apiece for Hipgnosis Songs Fund , days after Blackstone outbid it for the music rights owner of artists such as Shakira and Red Hot Chili Peppers.】

item.title: 松下电池部门年度利润低于预期
item.description: 日本松下控股公司（Panasonic Holdings）能源部门周四表示，由于日本电动汽车电池产量下降和消费产品销售额下降，该部门未能达到上一营业年度的营业利润预期。【原文：The energy unit of Japan's Panasonic Holdings missed its operating profit guidance for the past business year due to lower electric-vehicle battery production in Japan and a fall in sales of consumer products, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本新日铁全年利润下降 21%，超出预期
item.description: 日本最大的钢铁制造商新日铁周四公布，截至 3 月份的全年净利润为 5,494 亿日元，同比下降 20.8%，好于预期。【原文：Nippon Steel , Japan's biggest steelmaker, posted on Thursday a 20.8% fall in net profit for the year ended in March to 549.4 billion yen, beating estimates.】

item.title: 受欧元需求影响，ITV 预计第二季度广告收入将增长 12
item.description: 英国 ITV 称，受 6 月份欧洲杯足球赛的推动，第二季度的广告收入将猛增约 12%，是第一季度的四倍。【原文：Britain's ITV said its advertising revenue would jump by around 12% in the second quarter, four times the level achieved in the first, boosted by the Euros soccer championship which kicks off in June.】

item.title: 碧桂园称其目标是在 5 月 13 日前支付周四到期的岸上息票
item.description: 陷入困境的中国开发商碧桂园表示，它无法支付周四到期的岸上息票，但它的目标是在宽限期内，于 5 月 13 日前支付这笔款项和产生的额外利息。【原文：Embattled Chinese developer Country Garden said it is unable to pay onshore coupons due on Thursday but it aims to make the payment and additional interest incurred by May 13, within the grace period.】

item.title: 中国特大城市、阿里巴巴总部所在地杭州全面取消购房禁令
item.description: 中国东部大都市杭州是中国最繁华的城市之一，该市周四表示将取消所有购房限制，以支撑其房地产市场，这使得其他城市也有可能效仿。【原文：China's eastern metropolis of Hangzhou, among the country's most thriving cities, on Thursday said it will lift all home purchase restrictions to shore up its real estate market, raising the prospect of other cities following suit.】

item.title: 早间竞价：英国央行将测试减息假设
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 中国 4 月原油进口同比增长 5.45
item.description: 周四的官方数据显示，由于炼油企业为全面恢复的劳动节假期旅游旺季做好准备，中国 4 月份的原油进口量同比增长。【原文：China's crude oil imports rose on the previous year in April, as refiners prepared for a fully recovered Labour Day holiday travel season, official data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 需求疲软抑制菲律宾第一季度经济增长，利率可能按兵不动
item.description: 由于消费支出疲软抑制了经济增长，菲律宾第一季度的经济加速度低于预期，这加强了人们对菲律宾央行下周将维持利率不变的预期，尽管通胀率在上升。【原文：The Philippine economy accelerated less than expected in the first quarter as weaker consumer spending restrained growth, reinforcing expectations that the central bank will leave interest rates unchanged next week, despite rising inflation.】

item.title: 中国 4 月份出口恢复增长，进口超出预期
item.description: 周四的海关数据显示，中国出口在3月份大幅萎缩后于4月份恢复增长，这表明海外需求有所改善，政策制定者希望这种改善能延续到今年下半年。【原文：China's export returned to growth in April after contracting sharply in March, customs data showed on Thursday, suggesting some improvement in overseas demand that policymakers will hope extends through the rest of this year.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因关注中国贸易而低迷，日元在近期下跌后企稳
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市低迷，投资者在等待中国贸易数据，以判断中国经济的健康状况；日元在连跌三天后企稳，因为日本在谈论可能的货币干预措施。【原文：Asian shares were subdued on Thursday as investors awaited China trade data to gauge the health of the Chinese economy, while the yen steadied after three days of declines as Japan talked up a potential currency intervention.】

item.title: 华为新款 Pura 70 智能手机有哪些功能？
item.description: 华为新款高端智能手机 Pura 70 系列在上月推出后迅速售罄，分析师将其视为苹果 iPhone 的又一挑战者，更有迹象表明这家中国公司正在反击美国的限制。【原文：Huawei's new high-end Pura 70 smartphone series quickly sold out after it was launched last month with analysts touting it as another Apple iPhone challenger and adding to signs of how the Chinese firm is beating back against U.S. curbs.】

item.title: 独家：华为新手机使用更多中国制造部件和存储芯片
item.description: 一项拆解分析显示，华为最新款高端手机采用了更多中国供应商的产品，包括新的闪存存储芯片和改进的芯片处理器，这表明中国正朝着技术自给自足的方向迈进。【原文：Huawei's latest high-end phone features more Chinese suppliers, including a new flash memory storage chip and an improved chip processor, a teardown analysis showed, pointing to the progress China is making towards technology self-sufficiency.】

item.title: 关键通胀数据逼近，美元保持坚挺
item.description: 周四，美元兑大多数其他货币保持在较窄的区间内，交易商在等待关键的美国通胀数据，以寻找有关美联储政策的线索，而对日本和美国之间巨大利率差距的关注则帮助美元兑日元取得了一些涨幅。【原文：The dollar held tight ranges against most peers on Thursday as traders awaited key U.S. inflation data for cues on Federal Reserve policy, while the focus on the massive interest rate gap between Japan and the U.S. helped it make some gains on the yen.】

item.title: 摩根大通澳大利亚分公司因允许可疑客户订单被罚款 50.9 万美元
item.description: 摩根大通澳大利亚分公司被罚款 77.5 万澳元（509,252.50 美元），原因是该国企业监管机构周四表示，摩根大通允许客户在小麦期货交易中下达旨在操纵市场的可疑订单。【原文：JPMorgan's Australian arm has been fined A$775,000 ($509,252.50) for allowing suspicious client orders to be placed on wheat futures trading designed to manipulate the market, the country's corporate regulator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 石油因美国原油库存减少和美联储降息希望而上涨
item.description: 周四早盘，油价上涨，原因是美国原油库存减少表明供应趋紧，而且美联储将在年底前降息的希望不断升温。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Thursday as shrinking U.S. crude inventories signalled tighter supply, and amid rising hopes that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates by the end of the year.】

item.title: 日本央行董事会 4 月转向鹰派，许多人认为有必要进一步加息--摘要
item.description: 一份会议意见摘要显示，日本央行董事会成员在 4 月份的政策会议上绝大多数转向鹰派，许多人呼吁有必要稳步提高利率，以防止通胀超调的风险。【原文：Bank of Japan board members turned overwhelmingly hawkish at their April policy meeting with many calling for the need to raise interest rates steadily to forestall risks of an inflation overshoot, a summary of opinions at the meeting showed.】

item.title: 日本 3 月实际工资下降，持续两年下滑
item.description: 日本劳动省周四的数据显示，日本 3 月份经通胀调整后的实际工资同比下降 2.5%，连续两年下降。【原文：Japan's inflation-adjusted real wages in March fell 2.5% from a year earlier, marking declines for two straight years, labour ministry data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 贸易协会调查显示 79% 的美国生物技术公司与中国公司签约
item.description: 华盛顿一家代表生物技术公司的行业协会最近进行的一项调查发现，在 124 家受访公司中，79% 的公司至少与一家总部设在中国或由中国拥有的制造商签订了一份合同或产品协议。【原文：A recent survey carried out by a Washington-based trade association representing biotechnology companies found that 79% of 124 respondents have at least one contract or product agreement with a manufacturer based in China or owned by China.】

item.title: 消息人士称，派拉蒙正与索尼、阿波罗商谈开放账本事宜
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周三表示，派拉蒙全球公司正在与索尼影业和收购公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）组成的财团洽谈，该财团有意收购这家美国媒体公司。【原文：Paramount Global is in talks about opening its books to a consortium of Sony Pictures and buyout firm Apollo Global Management interested in acquiring the U.S. media company, people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】
